price: 208. Mpe tobomaka mboka te, sé totinda bakebisi liboso.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
